fields.name: reference_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the user with the reference number of the Question Period Note. This number is a mandatory system requirement when publishing a template.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Title (English)
fields.description: This field is populated by the user with the official title of the Question Period Note, in English.

fields.name: title_fr
fields.title: Title (French)
fields.description: This field is populated by the user with the official title of the Question Period Note, in French.

fields.name: minister
fields.title: Title of Minister
fields.description: This field will display the title of the Minister for whom the Question Period Note was created.

fields.name: question_en
fields.title: Issue/Question (English)
fields.description: This section will display the issue or question the Minister is responding to, in English.

fields.name: question_fr
fields.title: Issue/Question (French)
fields.description: This section will display the issue or question the Minister is responding to, in French.

fields.name: date_received
fields.title: Date Provided to the Minister's Office
fields.description: This field will display the date on which the Question Period Note was provided to the Minister's Office.

fields.name: response_en
fields.title: Suggested Response (English)
fields.description: This field will display the Suggested Response section of the Question Period Note, in English.

fields.name: response_fr
fields.title: Suggested Response (French)
fields.description: This field will display the Suggested Response section of the Question Period Note, in French.

fields.name: background_en
fields.title: Background (English)
fields.description: This field should display the background section of the Question Period note, In English.

fields.name: background_fr
fields.title: Background (French)
fields.description: This field should display the background section of the Question Period note, In French.

fields.name: additional_information_en
fields.title: Additional Information (English)
fields.description: This field will display any additional information, as deemed necessary, in English.

fields.name: additional_information_fr
fields.title: Additional Information (French)
fields.description: This field will display any additional information, as deemed necessary, in French.
